title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + TIPS FOR INVESTIGATING DANGEROUS CAREGIVERS
description: A set of tips for investigating dangerous caregivers, based on the experiences of a reporter investigating a state-funded community residential program for developmentally disabled adults who are in trouble with the law.
